name: Trenchball
description:
Score goals by getting the ball to your opponents end. Evade opponent players and pass the ball to your players.

Features:

Single game mode. Play a one off match.

Tournament mode. Compete in a knock out tournament.

League mode. Start out in the bottom league. Earn coins based on your teams performance. Use your coins to upgrade your players. Earn promotion to the top league via the play offs.

Multiplayer mode. Play a one off match against an opponent on line.

Tutorial.
